resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

Once upon a time Polyphemus, the cyclop, drunk some wine with a stranger named “Nobody”. Polyphemus, the drunken beast, got blinded by the same Nobody. And since that day our beloved cycplop has been walking from one side to another... all lost. This app is the lost eye of cyclop which he will not use for seeing but far more importantly finding meaning, translating and searching. Via this app he will comprehend everyword he sees and can translate it to the most common languages or directly search it through search engines
Welcome to “Cyclopes” and have fun..
Ps: also stay away from anyone who called themselves “Nobody”
